content:
As an AI language model, I can provide you with a few popular online retailers that specialize in video game soundtracks:

1. Data Discs - specializes in releasing high-quality vinyl soundtracks for classic and modern video games. 2. Fangamer - offers a wide selection of video game music on vinyl, CD, and cassette. 3. Laced Records - specializes in producing high-quality vinyl soundtracks for popular video games. 4. Mondo - offers limited-edition vinyl releases of soundtracks for popular video games and movies. 5. Bandcamp - a platform for independent artists to sell their music, including many video game soundtracks. These retailers are just a few examples, and there are many more out there that you can explore. Each of them has a different selection, price range, and shipping policy, so you may want to compare these factors before making your purchase.
